alert.note: Alert for Logan; Union (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 7:53PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHEASTERN LOGAN COUNTY IN WEST CENTRAL OHIO AND CENTRAL UNION COUNTIES IN CENTRAL OHIO THROUGH 830 PM EDT... At 753 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near North Lewisburg, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Marysville, Richwood, West Mansfield, Magnetic Springs, Valley Hi, Zanesfield, Raymond, Broadway, Middleburg, Pharisburg, Pottersburg, Somersville, Essex and East Liberty. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
